header.title: FtpServer Remote Admin
header.subtitle: Introduction
header.notice: FtpServer documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

section.title: Overview
section.p: All the FTP server administrative tasks can be performed using remote admin user interface. We can also use SITE command to do that. You can start the admin console using java -jar ftp-admin.jar.
The admin UI uses RMI to connect to the server. It also displays the server real-time data.

section.title: Login
section.p: The first step is login. The admin user login/password depends on the user manager implementation. For the default user manager it is configurable. The default value is admin/admin.

section.title: User Management
section.p: The basic user management (addition/deletion/modification) can be done using the remote admin UI.

section.title: FTP Connections
section.p: Current FTP connections can be monitored remotely. You can close client connections too.

section.title: User Spying
section.p: Any FTP connection activity can be monitored remotely.

section.title: Upload/Download/Delete
section.p: You can get a list of all uploaded, downloaded and deleted files.

section.title: Global Statistics
section.p: Finally, you can also get the global statistics information.
